## ISDKOptions.gasless property

Optional gasless transaction configuration deadlineSeconds is the number of seconds before the transaction is considered expired.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
gasless: {
        biconomy: {
            apiId: string;
            apiKey: string;
            deadlineSeconds?: number;
        };
    };
```
